events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred last night at an intersection involving their vehicle.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and claimant's description of events.
An experienced auto claims agent was assigned to manage the claim to ensure quick and fair processing.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the customer was notified regarding the next steps.
The claimant was asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle along with the police report for investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents promptly, including detailed photos and official collision report.
The claims department has begun investigating the details of the accident to assess liability and damage.
Investigation concluded confirming the customer was not at fault, and damage estimates were verified.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repairs and rental car expenses was proposed to the claimant.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and appreciated the quick communication.
The claim was officially approved after the customer accepted the settlement terms without further negotiation.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount was issued directly to the customerâ€™s repair shop.
The claim was closed successfully after confirmation that the vehicle repairs were completed without issues.
All documentation and records related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
